dhruqvO#&si dhruqvO#&ha(gm) sa#jAqtEShu# BUyAsaqmityA#ha dhruqvAnEqvainA$n kuruta uqgrO$&syuqgrO#&ha(gm) sa#jAqtEShu# BUyAsaqmityAqhA pra#tivAdina EqvainA$n kurutE-&BiqBUra#syaBiqBUraqha(gm) sa#jAqtEShu# BUyAsaqmityA#haq ya Eqvaina#M pratyuqtpipI#tEq tamupA$syatE yuqnajmi# tvAq brahma#NAq daivyEqnEtyA#haiqSha vA 
aqgnEryOgaqstEnaiq - [  ] 33
